backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing customers, user profiles, and customer requests with admin and user authorization via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a landing-page navigation change to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of numerous frontend files across styling, config, routing, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode tokens using Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React application entrypoint into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, admin, and customer flows and provides the router to the app.
Layout wrapper providing container structure and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Holds WhatsApp number configuration and a small validator for ensuring proper format.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, fetching customers, and adding customers with normalized error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AddCustomerPage: Provides a form for admins to add customers with validation, permission checks, and customer list fetching.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Defines the admin area layout with session checks, Internet Identity validation, and access control before rendering nested routes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSignInPage: Handles admin sign‑in using email verification and Internet Identity authentication, creating a session on success.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerHome: Displays the customer portal home with session validation and a card to create new finance requests.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerRequ: Customer form page that validates input, checks WhatsApp config, and opens a prefilled WhatsApp message before showing an acknowledgment screen.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSign: Simple customer sign‑in page that validates an email and stores it in session before navigating to the customer portal.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with links to the admin portal and customer portal.
frontend/src/state/session.ts: Session utilities for storing and retrieving admin and customer emails using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/email.ts: Email utilities for normalizing emails and verifying allowed admin email.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a formatted WhatsApp message and constructs a wa.me link using the configured owner number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and theme utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and requirements for fixing external admin portal navigation.
